org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.inputs

Class InputType

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.inputs.InputType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InputType.InputTypeConvolutional, InputType.InputTypeFeedForward, InputType.InputTypeRecurrent

    public abstract class InputType
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The InputType class is used to track and define the types of activations etc used in a ComputationGraph. This is most useful for automatically adding preprocessors between layers. See: ComputationGraphConfiguration.GraphBuilder.setInputTypes(InputType...) and ComputationGraphConfiguration.addPreProcessors(InputType...)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
